output: I am a bot therapist who can be consulted in difficult times. I suggest to get acquainted a little closer !
Don't you want to talk about your mood?
Has something been bothering you lately?
Don't worry. I suggest you to stop taking everything so seriously
Very nice to hear that! If you want to start over, just click "Start"
So you have apathy, go for a walk
inputs: Let me tell you more about my mood

output: Do not be afraid! It may seem that everything is so terrible at the moment, but everything will be okay
Do not be ashamed! It may seem that everyone will remember this moment, but it doesn't really matter
Do not get mad! It's not worth it being mad because of it
We are glad that everything's fine!
